message: Fix huggingface_hub being detected on system when using comfyui portable with manager.
Patch Comfy Manager installing the wrong huggingface_hub version, which crashes ComfyUI on startup
Add sageattention flag to .bat files when installing it. Also make the checkbox modify the .bat files, not just restart functionality
Remove the sageattention flag from startup script when we uninstall it via pytorch, triton, or sageattention uninstallers
Update batch file paths for pre_launch.py to use the correct path for auto-fixing the comfyui environment
Clean corrupted packages in prestartup so that we can fix ComfyUI environment if broken
Create run_comfy.bat if it doe not exist for venv installs that were installed purely through manager
Correct .bat file patch path for pre_launch.py
Finalize ComfyUI Optimizer and ComfyUI stabilization techniques to recover broken installs.
Fix finding the parent folder when installing new torch versions
fix where pre_launch gets the pending installs from
Ensure uv uses portable python when needed, continued
Ensure uv uses standalone python
Ensure that critical packages reinstall when using uv
add uv install to pre_launch in case it isn't caught by prestartup
Update pre-launch to use uv if available.
ensure failsafe functionality runs each time ComfyUI is restarted.
Create prelaunch setup so that we can ensure comfy requirements are always reinitialized in case user inadvertantly installs a breaking python package
Add pre_launch script to free up packages so they can be cleaned up before comfyui launches.
Patch a Pillow and transformers  python package check into startup scripts and install if it's broken or missing to fix common broken python environments
Add batch file patching to prestartup_script for requirements installation

Refactor package deletion logic in prestartup_script and shared modules to improve accuracy in identifying package directories and metadata. Utilize regex for better matching of versioned metadata directories, ensuring more reliable force deletion of packages.
Fix prestartup to uninstall pending installs first, and then install for more reliable installation

Enhance package installation reliability by enforcing pip usage over uv in prestartup and installation processes. Implement recovery for broken packages due to missing RECORD files, allowing for force deletion and retry of installations. Update pip command handling to translate flags appropriately between pip and uv.
Repair critical packages that don't allow ComfyUI to restart when installing pytorch
Ensure critical packages and package versions are installed during pre-startup
Ensure pytorch version switcher can handle lock files and try reinstall again on prestartup if files are locked
Refactor pip command handling for embedded Python in uv module. Ensure correct placement of --system and --python flags after subcommands for proper execution.
Remove authentication checks from all ComfyUI Optimizer features, as these should be free.
Make uv prestartup installation more robust

Update huggingface_hub dependency to version 0.34.0 with hf_transfer included, and add transformers version 4.57.6 to requirements. This was leading to broken installs when transformers 5.0 was applied accidentally.
Handle transformers 5.0 not being compatible with most ComfyUI packages at this point.
Update huggingface_hub dependency to version 1.3.0 and separate hf_transfer into its own line in requirements.txt
Fixed restart flags not building correctly, and causing restart fail when certain flags are selected.
Fix prestartup python package dependency resolver to handle python portable. Enhance windows auto-installers to be more reliable
Optimize Common Comfy Settings to only save settings and not whole User Configuration tab.
Update default preview method in UserConfigPanel to 'auto'
Add common comfyui command line settings as User Configuration Settings.
Improve UI for extra models/custom nodes selector by making entire row clickable instead of just radio button
Support choosing the directory to install models from the extra_model_paths list. Support adding extra custom node paths, and choose which path to install new custom ndoes to.
Minor bug fixes to support enterprise licenses
Cleanup sageattention default behavior to catch non-nuvu sage installs.
Allow toggling sageattention from ComfyUI Optimizer since it causes quality loss with some models. Fix ComfyUI Optimizer requiring paid subscription for installs.

Enhance subscription and device verification logic. Introduce floating license checks to exempt users from device registration requirements. Update related functions and add user notifications in the frontend for floating license users.
Add capability for enterprise orgs. Including named and floating licenses managed by a central administrator(s).
Sort PyTorch versions by newest first. Modify docker to use torch 2.8.0 because of RunPod's driver constraints. Modify README to include git install instructions for windows.
Add more reliable sageattention detection  on linux
Fix pending installs when python packages fail to be in a consistent folder
install onnxruntime-gpu requirements before onnxruntime-gpu
Revert to install external deps for onnx
Remove external onnxruntime-gpu dependencies that sometimes fail to install even in prestartup
stabilize onnxruntime-gpu install when python files are locked
Add python package manager inside Nuvu for help with troubleshooting and reduce complexity when fixing broken Comfy Environment.
fix python conditional version installs
Make ComfyUI Optimizer Installations more reliable and robust.
Fix token redirecting incorrectly on login when using non local domains.
Cleanup orphaned dist-info directories on comfy prestartup
Add verbose logging for troubleshooting installers via -v flag. Updated triton-windows version to match current Comfy PyTorch version.
Allow Nuvu sign in from any domain.
Add downloading models from manually input links including huggingface and civitai
Handle cu13 onnxruntime-gpu needing nightly version for now.
--no-warn-script-location removed from python install commands because uv does not support it.
Show spinning icon when workflow media  is loading
Fix workflow media  expiring and not rehydrating.
Fix poor authentication handling, make it clearer when user is logged in vs not logged in.
Make sure workflow install message shows in all cases. Make workflow card height remain consistent even when there aren't enough cards to fill the container.
Fix version retrieval for Nuvu Updater
Change default workflow sort to Newest. Show model links to subscribed users in model downloader.
Correct Nuvu versioning search to clear a log error
Add workflow changelog
Fix broken package installer for manual comfy install
More robust portable and manual install updater Handle file locks when custom nodes, ComfyUI, and Nuvu use conpiled python packages Allow switching Nuvu and ComfyUI version through the interface
More robust update methodology for both ComfyUI manual/portable and Nuvu
Display actual subgraph names on failed install Use uv with python portable not just venv Display correct number of installed models when less than all of the models fail to download.
Bump default installed torch version to 2.9.1 cu13.0 for Comfy Speed Boosts and memory management. Ensure huggingface token persists with Comfy Portable
Further clarity in Comfy Manager description
Fix portable installer sageattention and triton
Add better SEO for discovering Nuvu through Manager
Update Comfy Registry Message for better searchability
change text from gray to white
update bottom login dialog link to go straight to demo
update login dialog link to go straight to demo
Add logging that nuvu prestartup was successful
More robust update handling when a locked file absolutely cannot be cleared
Fix update flow when updating comfy or nuvu
Improve Comfy Manager Description
Refactor prestartup script to focus solely on installing uv, removing the handling of Nuvu requirements.
Fix prestartup to only handle uv for fast custom node install. do not try to handle nuvu requirements at all.
Fix prestartup package lock.
More robust Nuvu updating. Eliminates package lock issues.
Fix package lock issue when updating Nuvu
Update Comfy Registry description to include SageAttention and Triton installers for enhanced clarity on features.
Enhance LoginForm with external logo link and website reference. Add hover effects for logo and visit link.
Fix prestartup script not being included in github build
Update RunPod links to align with Nuvu Account
Add uv installer for faster and more reliable custom node installation. Add screenshots for support tickets
Update README Documentation
tag push doesn't work, need to trigger a dispatch github action
Fix github workflow to deploy to Comfy Registry correctly.
Fix version update in github workflow
